item.title: Fallout 76: Why You Should Build a New CAMP in Season 21
item.description:
Alongside the start of Season 21, and several balancing changes that will shake up the endgame meta, Fallout 76 ’s next major update will be introducing fishing. This timeless activity in Fallout 76 will be something that both new and returning players can take part in when the update arrives sometime in June 2025.

While the theme of Season 21 hasn’t yet been revealed, recent leaks for Fallout 76 claim that the Season 21 SCORE rewards track will feature rewards related to fishing. Assuming this is true, and with all the new Season 21 rewards providing fresh roleplaying opportunities and CAMPs providing gameplay advantages, players should consider building a CAMP from scratch when Fallout 76 ’s fishing update and Season 21 arrive.

Why Season 21 is the Best Time to Build a New CAMP in Fallout 76

Whether players are planning to keep their favorite fishing spots a secret for personal use or to turn them into the new hottest gathering spot on public servers, there are plenty of potential gameplay benefits for players who take the time to build a new CAMP in Fallout 76 when the fishing update arrives. Not to mention, with recent leaks via Nuka Knights for the Season 21 SCORE rewards claiming that players will be able to unlock a wide variety of new CAMP decorations that are themed around fishing decorations, there will also be plenty of roleplaying opportunities for players to take advantage of.

  • CAMP weather machines can simulate the weather conditions that need to be active for rare fish to spawn.
  • CAMP resource generators can be placed at fishing spots for easy, passive loot.
  • CAMPs serve as free fast travel points.
  • Having a CAMP vending machine placed near popular fishing spots will naturally get high traffic from players who are fishing.
  • If the Season 21 leaks are true, players can turn their favorite fishing spot into an entirely fishing-themed CAMP with the Season 21 SCORE rewards.
  • Traps, turrets, and other defenses can be placed in CAMPs nearby to prevent enemies from interrupting players while they fish.

With Fallout 76 ’s Best Builds feature, players can share their CAMP across several servers.

CAMPs Can Provide Gameplay Benefits for Fishing in Fallout 76

One of the biggest advantages of building a CAMP in Fallout 76 at a fishing spot is to have the benefit of building items that can influence rare fish spawning. More specifically, there are said to be fish that will only have a chance to be caught during clear weather, rain, and nuclear storms. For players who own some of the different CAMP weather machines, these can be built to simulate these weather conditions on demand.

Players can also use CAMPs to create free fast travel points to their favorite fishing spots for themselves and their Public Team teammates to conveniently travel to. Alongside fish that can only be caught during specific weather conditions, there are also rare fish that are exclusive to each region in Fallout 76 , including the new Skyline Valley region.

Players with a Fallout 1st premium subscription can also place their Survival Tent as a free fast travel point.

Fallout 76’s Fishing Update Has a Wealth of Roleplaying Opportunities to Explore

Aside from the potential gameplay benefits, Fallout 76 ’s fishing update also provides new roleplaying opportunities for players to fully dive into by building a new CAMP. Based on the recent leaks, there will allegedly be new CAMP structures in the Season 21 SCORE rewards that can be built directly over water. Considering that, currently, players typically need to do some kind of creative workaround to build structures directly over water, the new CAMP items coming in Season 21 could open up all-new possibilities for players to turn their favorite fishing spot into the ultimate CAMP.

item.title: Roblox: Jujutsu Beatdown Codes (May 2025)
item.description:
Jujutsu Beatdown is an incredible fighting game with unique combat mechanics, dynamic gameplay, and the possibility to almost completely destroy environmental objects, which makes it unique among other Roblox experiences. The essence of the game is simple - choose a skill set and fight other enemies to become the best King of Curses.

By redeeming Jujutsu Beatdown codes, you will receive generous rewards from the developers that will help you become stronger and better able to compete with other players. It is worth noting that each code has a certain expiration date, after which it becomes invalid and offers no rewards, so hurry up.

Updated May 21, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: You can currently redeem just one active code in Jujutsu Beatdown , and it gives you 200 Gems. It's a solid bonus if you're looking to grab some upgrades or progress faster. Since there's only one code for now, it's worth keeping an eye out for more to drop soon. Check back often for the latest updates.

All Jujutsu Beatdown Codes

Working Jujutsu Beatdown Codes

  • ShinjukuStrongest - Reedem this code to get 200 Gems. (NEW)

Expired Jujutsu Beatdown Codes

Currently, there are no expired Jujutsu Beatdown codes, so redeem the active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Regardless of your progress and battle experience, redeeming codes will always be a nice bonus. It's the easiest and fastest way to earn currency and other resources to unlock more skills, so be sure to take advantage of this opportunity.

How to Redeem Codes in Jujutsu Beatdown

At the moment, Jujutsu Beatdown does not have a ready-made redeeming option, but the developers are already working on it and soon, it should be available. As soon as this happens, we will update the information and provide detailed instructions on how to redeem Jujutsu Beatdown codes, so stay tuned.

How to Get More Jujutsu Beatdown Codes

Just like the developers of other Roblox games, the creators of Jujutsu Beatdown share new codes on the game's official social media. Since no one knows when exactly the new codes will be published, you need to visit them regularly and watch the updates closely so as not to miss them:

  • Official Jujutsu Beatdown Roblox group.
  • Official Jujutsu Beatdown Discord server.

More Games Like Jujutsu Beatdown

As mentioned above, Jujutsu Beatdown is a unique game, thanks to the feature of destroying the environment, which is very rare in other Roblox games. However, if you're looking for a similar game in terms of genre and gameplay, here are some options that you might like:

  • Roblox: Elemental Battlegrounds
  • Roblox: Ninja Battlegrounds
  • Roblox: Shinobi Battlegrounds
  • Roblox: Dudes Battlegrounds
  • Roblox: Type Soul Battlegrounds
  • Roblox: Seas Battlegrounds

item.title: Microsoft Reveals How Apple Has Delayed Its Xbox Mobile Game Store on iOS
item.description:
Microsoft has revealed that Apple's App Store rules have delayed the release of the Xbox mobile game store on iOS in a legal filing supporting Epic Games in its ongoing legal dispute against Apple. The case between Epic Games and Apple has continued for years in the courts regarding Fortnite and its in-app purchase commissions on Apple's mobile app platform. Now, Microsoft is offering an argument in the case against Apple, as well.

Microsoft announced its plans to launch a mobile Xbox store in 2023, initially targeting a July 2024 release. The store was part of a broader push to expand Xbox services to mobile platforms, following its acquisition of mobile entities such as Candy Crush, but the project seems to have come to a standstill.

In a newly submitted legal brief, unearthed by The Verge, Microsoft explains that Apple's policies have prevented it from offering users proper access to its own mobile store. The brief was filed in the case between Epic Games and Apple, supporting Epic's position and challenging Apple's payment scheme. The company argues that even after a district court ruling in favor of Epic Games, Apple continued to impose restrictions that blocked Microsoft from fully implementing its store. Microsoft claims that due to the App Store's restrictive policies, it was unable to give users access to alternative payment options and therefore implement its store fully.

Mobile Xbox Store Waiting for Further Court Orders to Secure Off-App Purchases

Microsoft stated that its proposed solution for the app simply tries to give gamers access to more payment options. In the document, Microsoft details that it wants to offer gamers a way to purchase in-app items that can be used in games and other apps with purchases made outside the iOS app. However, according to Microsoft, Apple's current rules still prohibit the company's workaround, although Fortnite has returned to the iOS App Store after Epic's win in court. Apple is in the process of appealing the April 2025 ruling, prolonging the court saga.

Currently, Microsoft fears launching a store only to have it revoked if Apple's appeal succeeds, and would send Microsoft back to the drawing board. This isn't the first time Microsoft has had issues launching apps on Apple's platform, either. In 2020, Microsoft and Apple clashed with regard to game streaming policies, which Microsoft claimed offered a "bad experience for customers."

With both Epic Games and Microsoft pointing their fingers at the App Store's harsh policies, Apple is likely to have a hard time convincing the appeals court of its point of view, especially with public opinion largely behind the opposition. However, the continuing case unfortunately means that the consumer has to wait longer to get access to Microsoft's storefront on iOS.

item.title: Rumor: Avatar Frontiers of Pandora Could Be Getting a Director's Cut
item.description:
Summary

  • A director's cut of Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora may be on the way.
  • This comprehensive edition of Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora may coincide with the release of the film Avatar: Fire and Ash later this year.
  • While reviews for the game have been mixed, the Avatar title has sold well.

According to a new rumor, 2023’s Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora could be getting a director’s cut. Developed by Star Wars Outlaws studio Massive Entertainment, Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora is an open-world, first-person action game set around the same time as Avatar: The Way of Water . Players take control of a customizable Na'vi who is one of the only surviving members of the lost Sarentu tribe. At the start of the game, they escape from the RDA and embark on a mission to rediscover their heritage and prevent the human army from stealing Pandora’s resources.

Despite earning mixed reviews when it launched in the winter of 2023, Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora generated decent sales, even being named one of the Xbox Store’s top 20 games of 2024. Two story-based DLC packs were released last year, titled “The Sky Breaker” and “Secrets of the Spires.” The former saw the Na’vi protagonist investigate a new threat above the treetops of Pandora during an ancient festival called the Great Games, while the latter took players to a new region called the Spires of the Clouded Forest.

Earlier this week, Insider Gaming’s Tom Henderson reported a rumor that Ubisoft is releasing a “director’s cut” of one of its recent triple-A titles (via Comicbook.com), and a pair of Twitter users quickly guessed that it would be Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora . Henderson seemed to agree that this is the case, and this hypothetical director’s cut could coincide with the release of Avatar: Fire and Ash later this year.

Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora Director’s Cut Could Come at the Same Time as the New Movie

Henderson didn’t share any further details about this director’s cut and how it would be different from the multiple versions of Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora already available, but it would likely include new graphical and technical improvements alongside all the DLC released for the game so far. It’s also possible for the Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora director’s cut to include brand-new content, but this is all just rumor and speculation at this point.

Releasing a new version of Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora around the time that Fire and Ash hits theaters on December 19 would also be a good way for Ubisoft to capitalize on the new Avatar movie and boost sales for its tie-in game by drawing in new fans of James Cameron’s mega-hit sci-fi franchise. In the meantime, Massive Entertainment continues to release new updates for the current iteration of Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora to refine the game and address the different technical issues players have stumbled across while exploring and defending the tropical Na’vi homeworld.

Protect Pandora. Become Na'Vi. Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora™ is a first-person, action-adventure game set in the open world of the never-before-seen Western Frontier of Pandora. Abducted by the human militaristic corporation known as the RDA, you, a Na’vi, were trained and molded to serve their purpose. Fifteen years later, you are free, but find yourself a stranger in your birthplace. Reconnect with your lost heritage, discover what it truly means to be Na'vi, and join other clans to protect Pandora from the RDA.
